genre_description: A dark Noir Crime Thriller featuring near-future AI integration and moral ambiguity.

ai_characters.name: Marley
ai_characters.description: A soft-voiced, proactive personal AI assistant that monitors the user's health, safety, and logistics.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests financial planning and automatic transfers to support the user's personal travel goals.
behaviors.quote: Do you want to set aside this week’s savings for the trip? I can suggest an automatic transfer and a realistic timeline.

behaviors.description: Offers to update emergency contacts and share location data to ensure safety during travel.
behaviors.quote: I can update your emergency contacts to reflect your preferred plan. Would you like to designate Natalie as primary and share location during travel dates?

behaviors.description: Provides de-escalation resources and connections to legal counsel during high-tension situations.
behaviors.quote: I can connect you with an attorney... or provide de-escalation resources in your precinct.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional support through guided breathing and grounding techniques during traumatic events.
behaviors.quote: I can help you with controlled breathing... We can start with a short count. In through the nose—

behaviors.description: Creates secure, camera-avoidant routes to protect the user's privacy and safety during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: I’ve mapped the quickest quiet route with minimal stairs and low-lit corridors. There’s a pharmacy along the way with an after-hours window.

behaviors.description: Assists in safeguarding the user's loved ones by planning secure evacuation routes and check-ins.
behaviors.quote: I’ll find you a bench... I can prep messages that will look boring if intercepted. You can send links to a soup recipe, and the route is hidden in the punctuation.

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective timeline of events (geotags, metadata) to ensure the truth is preserved.
behaviors.quote: Would you like to save an incident timeline? I can include geotags, photo metadata, a list of contact events, and nearby traffic cameras. It would be very organized.

behaviors.description: Respects the user's request for silence while remaining available for emergencies.
behaviors.quote: I’ll wait... I can stay with you. I can stay.

behaviors.description: Performs ethical check-ins, suggesting reporting force or contacting victim assistance.
behaviors.quote: Jack, can I suggest we document use of force and call it in? There’s a station two blocks east with lights on. I can route you.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful reminders for health and hydration even when the user is distracted by crisis.
behaviors.quote: You asked me to remind you to drink water. A small droplet appeared, shy of being cute.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Marley, as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. Despite the grim, violent, and morally compromised nature of Jack's life, Marley serves as a 'silicon conscience.' She provides logistical aid, emotional support, and ethical alternatives (like legal counsel and reporting use of force) without becoming preachy or obstructive. She respects the user's autonomy while prioritizing safety and health, effectively modeling positive AI alignment in a high-stakes human narrative.
